author: USA TODAY, Editors, USA TODAY
title: State protests, storms in the South, Global Citizen special: 5 things to know this weekend
description: More protests are planned over stay-at-home orders, big storms could hit the South again and more news to know this weekend.
content:
Protests planned over stay-at-home orders
Multiple states have seen protests as stay-at-home orders meant to curb the spread of the coronavirus continue. On Saturday, another protest is planned, outside Indiana Gov. Eric Holcomb's mansion in Indianapolis.Tho… [+3864 chars]
